mainSection.title: Welcome to the Sterling Innovation Lab
mainSection.description: Discover the future of technology at the Sterling Technology Summit. Our Innovation Lab is divided into three unique sections, each showcasing how cutting-edge AI and machine learning can transform real-world operations and inspire creativity across industries.

subSections.title: Explore the Three Sections
subSections.description: Our lab splits into three experiences:

details.name: Purpose-Driven Demo Section
details.description: Featuring Rivertown Ball Company, a fictional case study used to demonstrate how modern AI and technology solutions can drive success in real-world business scenarios. This purpose-driven demo section highlights advancements in product quality, customer engagement, and operational efficiency.

details.name: Playground
details.description: Engage with our hands-on demos, such as custom ball design tools and interactive AI personalities, showcasing how tech can inspire creativity and customer connection in a fun and interactive way.

details.name: Partner Innovation Showcase
details.description: Discover innovations from our industry partners that bring world-class AI and technology solutions to life. This section highlights the collaborative efforts that push technology forward and demonstrate the power of partnership.
